name: ThermalSpecter
description:
Created for Trijam game jam in less than 9 hours. This is a small puzzle game in which temperature of the world changes, depending on near which end of the screen you are.

Controls: use arrows to move, press R to restart the level. You need to reach either left or right end of the screen. There are 8 levels, I might make more when I come up with the ideas for them.
